item.description:
THIS IS A PRIVATE EVENT JUST FOR US. THE STORE WILL NOT BE OPEN TO THE PUBLIC WHILE WE'RE THERE. THIS IS ALSO A FUNDRAISER TO START OUR HANUKKAH MITZVAH PROJECT. THERE IS A $2 PRE-PAID ENTRANCE FEE TO GET THE ADDRESS & YOU MAY ENVITE ONE PREPAID GUEST.

WINE & CHEESE WILL BE SERVED & THERE WILL BE SOME RAFFLES

This is an under- the- radar This is a clothing event, a sample sale, a warehouse sale, a pop-up store & an experience in "social shopping" all in one. Sizes go from petite through plus sizes. There are items for $10 & $20 and also expensive designer clothes. This is boutique quality clothing & the styles are very unusual You won't see yourself coming & going
item.name: LADIES FUNDRAISER SHOPPING SPREE at THE WORLD'S ONE & ONLY DESIGNERS CIRCUS
